name: Easy Post Duplicator
author: Dev02ali

sections.description:
This plugin used to quickly and easily duplicate posts, pages , custom post.By default the post will be duplicated with “publish” status.

To create duplicate, Just hover over a posts, pages , custom post in the edit screen and select ‘Duplicate’ to create a duplicate post.
sections.installation:
To install Easy Post Duplicator using the built-in plugin installer:

    1. Go to Plugins > Add New.
    2. Type in Easy Post Duplicator in Search Plugins box or click a tag link below the screen.
    3. find the Easy Post Duplicator Plugin in the list.
    4. Click Install Now to install the WordPress Plugin.


To install Easy Post Duplicator manually:

   1. Download your WordPress Plugin to your desktop.
   2. If downloaded as a zip archive, extract the Plugin folder to your desktop.
   3. With your FTP program, upload the Plugin folder to the wp-content/plugins folder in your WordPress directory online.
   4. Go to Plugins screen and find the Easy Post Duplicator Plugin in the list.
   5. Click Activate to activate it.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

To install Easy Post Duplicator using the built-in plugin installer:

    1. Go to Plugins > Add New.
    2. Type in Easy Post Duplicator in Search Plugins box or click a tag link below the screen.
    3. find the Easy Post Duplicator Plugin in the list.
    4. Click Install Now to install the WordPress Plugin.


To install Easy Post Duplicator manually:

   1. Download your WordPress Plugin to your desktop.
   2. If downloaded as a zip archive, extract the Plugin folder to your desktop.
   3. With your FTP program, upload the Plugin folder to the wp-content/plugins folder in your WordPress directory online.
   4. Go to Plugins screen and find the Easy Post Duplicator Plugin in the list.
   5. Click Activate to activate it.

Does this plugin support pages to duplicate?

Yes, supported.

Does this plugin support custom post types?

Yes, all registered custom post types are supported.

Does this plugin support custom fields?

Yes, all custom fields are supported.

How to duplicate custom post types?

Go to wp-admin >> pages/posts/custom post , On Quick edit bar click on duplicate.

short_description: Plugin duplicates the posts, pages all at once based on the post type,post status and even year of posts created.
